name: STMT_PMT_PLAN_ESTIMATES
description: Contains the pre-service estimates on payment plan that were included in the statement.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement or detail bill record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pre-service estimate on the payment plan that generated this statement.

columns.name: INITIAL_ESTIMATED_BAL
columns.description: The initial balance of the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total patient payments towards the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total patient adjustments towards the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: REMAINING_ESTIMATED_BAL
columns.description: The remaining balance of the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_ESTIMATED_BAL
columns.description: The remaining balance from the previous statement for the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new patient payments towards the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The new patient adjustments towards the pre-service estimate on the payment plan.
